title: (x) Futura with non-lining figures - various {gang}
content:
Is there a Futura with non-lining figures? Or a Futura-like typeface with OSF? I've seen it before in a book but can't find anything.   
   
Thanks,   
   
Kevin
author: kvdl

comments.content: [Neufville](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516143638/http:/www.neufville.com/uk/startfuk.htm) has lots of Futura variations, including non-lining figures. (I'd link directly to the sample page, but the site uses frames so I can't.)
Sad the Neufville Futura SC are mostly reduced versions of the larger caps, they don't fit.

The Foundry's [Architype Renner](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516143638/http:/www.on-idle.com/foundry/foundry_architype_1/renner.html) includes text figures, as well as loads of   
funky alternate characters based on Renner's drawings.
